snippet: To mark this weekend’s Les Journées Particulières, during which various LVMH brands open the doors of their workshops to the public, here’s an insider’s view of the creation of a Bulgari handbag.
abstract: To mark this weekend’s Les Journées Particulières, during which various LVMH brands open the doors of their workshops to the public, here’s an insider’s view of the creation of a Bulgari handbag.

headline.main: The Making Of | Bulgari's Isabella Rossellini Bag, From First Sketch to Finished Product
